key.name: toggle
key.description: Toggle all particle effects.

key.name: gx
key.description: Global horizontal gravity (-0.01 - 0.01)

key.name: gy
key.description: Global vertical gravity (-0.01 - 0.01)

key.name: g-strength
key.description: The strength of this gravity source. Use negative values for a repulsing effect.

key.name: g-posx
key.description: The horizontal position of this gravity source. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: g-posy
key.description: The vertical position of this gravity source. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: g-speed
key.description: The speed of this gravity source. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: g-angle
key.description: The angle for the movement of this gravity source. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: g-movement
key.description: The movement type of this source: Fixed (not moving at all), Mouse Position (exactly on the core pointer), Follow Mouse (moving towards core pointer at set speed), Bounce (moving at constant speed, bouncing off the walls) or Wrap (moving at constant speed, jumping to the opposite side at a wall).

key.name: e-active
key.description: Since emitters have a lot of options, you can simply deactivate and name them instead of deleting them.

key.name: e-name
key.default: ['Fire Ball','Flame Pointer','Magic Pointer','Magic Rain (On/Off)','Magic Rain with Gravity Particles','Random Red Explosion','Random Yellow Explosion','Random Green Explosion','Random Blue Explosion','Random Purple Explosion']
key.description: Since emitters have a lot of options, you can simply deactivate and name them instead of deleting them.

key.name: e-trigger
key.description: The trigger to create particles: Persitent (create particles all the time), Mouse Movement (create particles when the mouse is being moved), Random Shot (a single particle burst once in a while), Random Period (randomly turning on and off particle production) or Notification (a single particle burst on notification events).

key.name: e-posx
key.description: The horizontal position of this emitter. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: e-posy
key.description: The vertical position of this emitter. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: e-speed
key.description: The speed of this emitter. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: e-angle
key.description: The angle for the movement of this emitter. May be ignored or used for initialisation, depending on the movement type.

key.name: e-movement
key.description: The movement type of this emitter: Mouse Position (exactly on the core pointer), Follow Mouse (moving towards core pointer at set speed), Bounce (moving at constant speed, bouncing off the walls) or Wrap (moving at constant speed, jumping to the opposite side at a wall).

key.name: e-count
key.description: The amount of particles generated each time this emitter is triggered.

key.name: e-h
key.description: The color of the particles. This is hue like in HSL colors. It is the center of the range given below.

key.name: e-dh
key.description: The color of the particles can be any value from the hue (given above) plus/minus this range. A range of 500 means any color.

key.name: e-l
key.description: The color of the particles. This is lightness like in HSL colors. It is the center of the range given below.

key.name: e-dl
key.description: The color of the particles can be any value from the lightness (given above) plus/minus this range.

key.name: e-a
key.description: The alpha (opacity) of the particles. This is the center of the range given below.

key.name: e-da
key.description: The alpha (opacity) of the particles can be any value from the alpha (given above) plus/minus this range.

key.name: e-dx
key.description: The horizontal range of the particles.

key.name: e-dy
key.description: The vertical range of the particles.

key.name: e-dcirc
key.description: The circular range of the particles.

key.name: e-vx
key.description: The horizontal speed of the particles.

key.name: e-vy
key.description: The vertical speed of the particles.

key.name: e-vt
key.description: The more negative the sooner particles disappear.

key.name: e-vphi
key.description: The rotation of the particles can probably only be seen on the really big ones.

key.name: e-dvx
key.description: The horizontal speed range of the particles.

key.name: e-dvy
key.description: The vertical speed range of the particles.

key.name: e-dvcirc
key.description: The circular speed range of the particles.

key.name: e-dvt
key.description: The range of aging speeds

key.name: e-dvphi
key.description: The rotation of the particles can probably only be seen on the really big ones.

key.name: e-s
key.description: The size of the particles.

key.name: e-ds
key.description: The size range of the particles.

key.name: e-snew
key.description: The size of the particles when they are new.

key.name: e-dsnew
key.description: The size range of the particles when they are new.

key.name: e-g
key.description: The strength of the gravity effect, these particles have. (See gravity probability. May be especially resource consuming.)

key.name: e-dg
key.description: The strength range of the gravity effect, these particles have. (See gravity probability. May be especially resource consuming.

key.name: e-gp
key.description: The probability that a particle has the gravity effect, that has been set up above. This value represents gravity particles out of 10000 particles. (Using gravity on too many particles may be very resource consuming.)

key.name: hard-limit
key.description: If this hard limit is reached, no new particles are created. (100 - 5000)

key.name: soft-limit
key.description: This soft limit can be exceeded. If this happens, particles will die faster. (100 - 5000)

key.name: darken
key.description: Darken background under particles (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: blend
key.description: Additive blending of particles

key.name: tnew
key.description: If the age of a particle is above this value, it is regarded as new and is especially bright and large. Particles are born at the age of 1.0 and die at the age of 0.0. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: told
key.description: If the age of a particle is below this value, it is regarded as old and starts to fade. Particles are born at the age of 1.0 and die at the age of 0.0. (0.0 - 1.0)
